name: Smartwool PhD Run Light Elite Marble Wash Micro Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Run Light Elite Marble Wash Micro Socks
description: Running is more fun colourful swirly socks. These socks feature Indestructawool technology and targeted cushioning designed for runners. The high-density knit is super-durable and provides long-lasting comfort.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit those with narrower feet.
